original_title: Eru Ilúvatar: The Ethos of Tolkien’s Lore
overview: Tolkien has hidden a strong message in his stories, and most of the people have not noticed it. Find out what you most likely have missed and what is the hidden symbolism behind Tolkien's stories The Lord of the Rings and The Silmarillion, analysed by a Tolkien specialist, Tolkien language scholar and Lutheran pastor Petri Tikka. Visually impressive documentary features amazing artworks by Jef Murray.
title: Eru Ilúvatar: The Ethos of Tolkien’s Lore
